points.title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
points.status: "You shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Rokfin and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents, from and against all third party actions that: (i) arise from any of your activities on the Rokfin Service; (ii) assert a violation by you of any term of this Agreement; or (iii) assert that any Content submitted by you to Rokfin violates any law or infringes any third party right, including any intellectual property or privacy right."

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
points.status: If Rokfin deletes your account for the foregoing reasons, you may not re-register for the Rokfin Service. Rokfin may block your email address and Internet protocol address to prevent further registration.

points.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
points.status:
"Explicitly, but not limited to, Content you may not upload, post, or transmit (collectively, "submit") any video, image, text, audio recording, or other work that:

Contains pornography (provided, however, that non-sexual nudity is permitted)"

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
points.status: "We may include small graphic images in our email messages and newsletters to determine whether the messages were opened and the links were viewed."

points.title: First-party cookies are used
points.status: "Our Websites and those of our Products may use cookies "

points.title: Information is provided about security practices
points.status: "Where applicable, we undertake security steps, including use of SSL technology, on our back-end systems that store customer account information and to protect data transmissions."

points.title: Promises will be kept after a merger or acquisition
points.status: "in connection with the sale, merger, bankruptcy, sale of assets or reorganization of our company. We will notify you if a different company receives your data. The promises in this privacy policy apply to any data transferred to a new entity."

points.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
points.status: " If we are going to release your data, we will do our best to provide you with notice in advance by email, unless we are prohibited by law from doing so."

points.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
points.status: " if we believe that disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with a law, regulation, or other valid legal process (e.g., subpoenas or warrants served on Rokfin)."

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
points.status: "These companies may have access to your data to perform their services, and are obligated by contract to safeguard any of your data they receive from us to the same extent that Rokfin protects it."

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.status: "with our service providers, who are companies that are contractually engaged with us to provide us with services, such as email management, analyzing data trends, credit card processing and fraud detection and prevention. "

points.title: Your personal data is not sold
points.status: "We never sell your information to third parties."

points.title: You aren’t forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
points.status: "Any action arising out of or relating to this Agreement or your use of the Rokfin Service must be commenced in the state or federal courts located in Travis County, Texas, United States of America (and you consent to the jurisdiction of those courts)."

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Texas, USA)
points.status: "This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas, United States of America, without regard to principles of conflicts of law. "

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
points.status: "Rokfin's total liability to you shall not exceed the amounts paid by you to Rokfin over the twelve (12) months preceding your claim(s)"

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.status: "To the fullest extent permitted by law: (i) Rokfin shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data or other intangible losses;"

points.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
points.status: "If you are a copyright owner, authorized to act on behalf of one, or authorized to act under any exclusive right under copyright, please report alleged copyright infringements taking place on or through the Site by completing the following DMCA Notice of Alleged Infringement and delivering it to Rokfin’s Designated Copyright Agent."

points.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
points.status: "By submitting a video, you grant Rokfin and its affiliates a [...] license and right to copy, transmit, distribute, publicly perform and display (through all media now known or hereafter created)"

points.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
points.status: "By submitting a video, you grant Rokfin and its affiliates a limited, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license"

points.title: You maintain ownership of your content
points.status: "As between you and Rokfin, you own the video Content ("videos") that you submit to the Rokfin Service."

points.title: Per the service's terms, you may not express negative opinions about them
points.status: "Rokfin may suspend, disable, or delete your account (or any part thereof) or block or remove any Content you submitted if Rokfin determines that you have violated any provision of this Agreement or that your conduct or Content would tend to damage Rokfin's reputation and goodwill."

points.title: Your content can be deleted if you violate the terms
points.status: "block or remove any Content you submitted if Rokfin determines that you have violated any provision of this Agreement"

points.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
points.status: "Rokfin may suspend, disable, or delete your account (or any part thereof) or block or remove any Content you submitted if Rokfin determines that you have violated any provision of this Agreement or that your conduct or Content would tend to damage Rokfin's reputation and goodwill."

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
points.status: "You may delete your account at any time. "

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
points.status: " By default, all subscriptions are set to automatically renew for the same period of time as the original subscription."

points.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
points.status: "Users who purchase monthly subscriptions have five (5) days after purchase to cancel and receive a full refund."

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
points.status: "If you become aware of an unauthorized access to your account, you must change your password and notify us immediately."

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
points.status: "You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account, including any activity by authorized or unauthorized users. You must not allow others to use your account credentials and you must safeguard the confidentiality of those credentials"

points.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
points.status: "USER NAME: We encourage you to use your real name. If you are a business, government, or non-profit entity, you must use the actual name of your organization. "

points.title: Harming minors in any ways is prohibited
points.status: "In using the Rokfin Service, you must behave in a civil and respectful manner at all times. Further, you will not: [...] Harm or exploit minors;"

points.title: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
points.status: "Explicitly, but not limited to, Content you may not upload, post, or transmit (collectively, "submit") any video, image, text, audio recording, or other work that: [...] Depicts unlawful acts or extreme violence;"

points.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
points.status: "If you are at least 13 but are still a minor (this depends on where you live), you must have your parent or legal guardian's permission to use the Rokfin Service. "

points.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
points.status: "You must be at least 13 years old to use the Rokfin Service."
